name: Spooky Squashers
description:
A quirky, fast paced and unique squash arcade game. Escape the spooky castle built on an old chef graveyard and beat the evil chef ghost and his minions.

  • Beat your high score
  • Modify your ball with power-ups like the Bowling Ball or the Missile
  • Unlock new rackets like the Shovel or the Frying Pan
